thoughtText: Wow! That pattern is so cool, thanks for sharing.
I can't wait to try this!
Not bad, but I would do it differently, I can explain how.
Where did you get these materials?
Hey, I'm having a bit of trouble with this part, can you elaborate further?
How long does this project usually take? My sisters birthday is in a week and I want to make this for her
I really like that color you used! Where did you get that yarn?
Are you a professional? I'm so impressed!
I hurt my hand trying to do this...remember to take breaks if you're trying to finish the pattern in one session
Is this pattern onlu for one size, or can I scale it up?
